JGAL

Class GAL_ChromosomeConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_ChromosomeConfig

  • public class GAL_ChromosomeConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    The GAL_ChromosomeConfig is a class for the configuration of a GAL_Chromosome

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected GAL_GeneConfig[] configuration
      Array with the configuration of each gene of the chromosome

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new GAL_ChromosomeConfig objet with an array of GAL_GeneConfig.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GAL_ChromosomeConfig

        public GAL_ChromosomeConfig(GAL_GeneConfig[] configuration)
                     throws NotValidChromosomeException
        Constructs a new GAL_ChromosomeConfig objet with an array of GAL_GeneConfig.
        Parameters:
        configuration - Array of GAL_GeneConfig wich correspond with each gene configuration for the Chromosome.
        Throws:
        NotValidChromosomeException - If the configuration array is empty or null

    • Method Detail

      • createNewChromosome

        public GAL_Chromosome createNewChromosome()
                                   throws NotValidChromosomeException
        Creates and returns a new GAL_Chromosome using the method createNewGene.
        Returns:
        The new GAL_Chromosome.
        Throws:
        NotValidChromosomeException - If the configuration array is empty.

        public GAL_GeneConfig<?> getGeneConfiguration(int pos)
        Gets the gene configuration in the position denoted by the int parameter.
        Parameters:

      • modifyChromosome

        public void modifyChromosome(GAL_Chromosome chromosome,
                    int pos)
        Modifies randomly a Chromosome at the gene position given by the integer argument.
        Parameters:
        chromosome - The GAL_Chromosome to be modified.
        pos - The position where the GAL_Chromosome will be modified.

      • modifyChromosome

        public void modifyChromosome(GAL_Chromosome chromosome,
                    int min,
                    int max)
        Modifies randomly a Chromosome at the genes between the positions min and max.
        Parameters:
        chromosome - The GAL_Chromosome to be modified.
        min - The first position to be modified.
        max - The first position to not be modified after min.

      • modifyChromosome

        public void modifyChromosome(GAL_Chromosome chromosome,
                    GAL_Chromosome chromosome2,
                    int pos)
                      throws NotValidGeneException,
                             java.lang.ClassCastException
        Modifies the first Chromosome by the second Chromosome at the gene position given by the integer argument.
        Parameters:
        chromosome - The GAL_Chromosome to be modified.
        chromosome2 - The GAL_Chromosome to be used as modifier.
        pos - The position where the GAL_Chromosome will be modified.
        Throws:
        NotValidGeneException - If the gene at pos from the first chromosome is not compatible with the gene from the second one.
        java.lang.ClassCastException - If the gene at pos from the second chromosome is not castable.

      • modifyChromosome

        public void modifyChromosome(GAL_Chromosome chromosome,
                    GAL_Chromosome chromosome2,
                    int min,
                    int max)
                      throws NotValidGeneException,
                             java.lang.ClassCastException
        Modifies the first Chromosome by the second Chromosome at the genes between the positions min and max.
        Parameters:
        chromosome - The GAL_Chromosome to be modified.
        chromosome2 - The GAL_Chromosome to be used as modifier.
        min - The first position to be modified.
        max - The first position to not be modified after min.
        Throws:
        NotValidGeneException - If at least one of the genes between min and max from the first chromosome is not compatible with the genes from the second one.
        java.lang.ClassCastException - If at least one of the genes between min and max from the second chromosome is not castable.

      • clone

        public GAL_ChromosomeConfig clone()
        Returns a copy of this GAL_ChromosomeConfig.

        Returns:
        A copy of this GAL_ChromosomeConfig.
